cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Commonwealth of Nations
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To foster international cooperation and trade links between people all over the world.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: International Centre for the Study of the Preservation and Restoration of Cultural Property
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To promote the conservation of all forms of cultural heritage, in every region of the world.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Organisation internationale de la Francophonie
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To promote the French language and cultural and linguistic diversity and to promote peace, democracy, and human rights.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Community of Portuguese Language Countries
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To deepen mutual friendship and cooperation among its members in the areas of language, education, and culture.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Organization of Ibero-American States
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To promote education, science, technology, and culture in the Ibero-American region.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Arab League
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To strengthen ties among member states, coordinate policies, and promote common interests.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Organisation of Islamic Cooperation
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To safeguard and protect the interests of the Muslim world in the spirit of promoting international peace and harmony.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: International Organization of Turkic Culture
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To promote Turkic culture and art.

cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.name: Interparliamentary Assembly on Orthodoxy
cultural_ethnic_linguistic_religious_org.purpose: To foster relationships and mutual understanding among Orthodox Christian communities worldwide.
